tool_description: Daily Quotes API, Over half a million quotes from thousands of authors from all over the world.
name: Daily Quote
title: Daily Quote

api_list.name: Random Keyword
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-quote.p.rapidapi.com/api/keywords/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-quote.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
